argSrc: For dog dirt left on the pavement dog owners should by all means pay a bit more.
argTrg: Indeed it's not the fault of the animals,

argSrc: For dog dirt left on the pavement dog owners should by all means pay a bit more.
argTrg: but once you step in it, their excrement seems to stick rather persistently to your soles.
